fields.description:
Steps to reproduce...

1. Log in as eucalyptus/admin
2. Go to accounts landing page and create an account (or create account via dashboard link)
3. Enter 'admin' in the user field (btw, why is that field marked required?)
4. Click "Create Account".  Notice error, which prevents download of acct-users.csv creds file
5. The account is created, but there's no way to log in since the creds download failed in step 4.

Screenshot attached
fields.summary: Creating an account with 'admin' user entered prevents download of credentials

comments.body: I guess it isn't intuitive that admin gets created automatically. We should disallow "admin" in the user editor widget.
Added to KI for 4.2 with workaround to instruct them not to add admin account.
needs UX prior to implementing fix.
[~jloza], I assume we disallow "admin" for user name. Did you want to define messaging for a validation error?
Yes, I will open a linked UX ticket for the work for this one.
[~kgill][~jloza] maybe we should not allow creation of admin user during acct creation since it is going to be created anyway and will have admin access.
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1678

[~ashamblin], the UX ticket for this work is UX-94 Wireframe Changes Required for Automatic Creation of Admin User in New Account ([https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/UX-94]) which references wireframe [https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Create+new+user]. UX-94 is currently In Review by [~jloza].

So what is the answer to [~kgill]'s question? Is an entry required in the user "Name" field (see attachment) !Name field is required.png|thumbnail! ?
wireframe for UX-94 has been reviewed and approved. [~ashamblin], please update implementation as necessary to match wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Create+account

Latest revision is updated in line with associated UX ticket.

I've taken minor liberties with the layout of the user list in that I've added a disabled "remove" icon next to the default admin user.  I built it first without the icon, but I didn't like how it looked.  Please review, it can easily be removed if you don't like it.

[~ashamblin], the disabled remove icon is a nice addition -- keeps the user names lined up.

I updated the wireframe: [https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Create+account]

Could you please:

* Change "Admin" to "admin" as a result of [~dkavanagh]'s suggestion
* Remove the required field * after "Add a user" (don't need to add a user when creating an account)
Made the updates requested.  Please review.

Argh! I neglected to add a detail.

The "Add User" button should be available after the user enters a valid account name _and_ a valid user name.

Sorry. My fault.
Also, just documenting that there is no requirement to create a user when creating a new account.

hi [~ashamblin], today in the team meeting, the add user button did not work until there was a value in the ACCOUNT name field. That is **not** the desired behavior (despite [~lnajjar]'s previous comment), add user functionality should only be dependent on the USER name field. Can you fix that as part of this ticket, please? I'm hijacking the UX review to make sure that gets fixed. Lawrence can do the rest of the review once that's fixed.

Thanks!
[~ashamblin], since you said this morning you fixed the item I commented about, is this ticket ready to go back to in review?
Yes!  Thanks for catching this.  Ready for review.

Nice work, [~ashamblin].

Verified on Macintosh running Chrome 46.0.2490.71 (64-bit), Firefox 41.0.2, and Safari 9.0.1.

UX review passed. Ready for code review.
[~alice], [~ccassler]: Any ideas why Jenkins won't run on https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1678 ?  I tried re-triggering the build but no luck yet.
PR 1678 merged

Verified.  I was not able to add 'admin' as a user but I was still able to download the credentials and login to the account.
